QueryViewSpec.Name: Check For Tabs In Constituent Address Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Displays records that have tab characters in address fields
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select c.[ID], case when [ADDRESSBLOCK] like '%' + CHAR(9) + '%' then 'Address Field' when City like '%' + CHAR(9) + '%' then 'City Field' when POSTCODE like '%' + CHAR(9) + '%' then 'PostCode Field' when dbo.[ADDRESS].[DESCRIPTION] like '%' + CHAR(9) + '%' then 'Description Field' end as FIELDWITHTABS, c.LOOKUPID as CONSTITUENTID, [ADDRESSBLOCK], [CITY], [POSTCODE], dbo.[ADDRESS].[DESCRIPTION], atc.[DESCRIPTION] as ADDRESSTYPE, ctry.ABBREVIATION as CONTRYABBREVIATION, ctry.[DESCRIPTION] as COUNTRYDESCRIPTION from dbo.[ADDRESS] join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = CONSTITUENTID join dbo.COUNTRY ctry on ctry.ID = COUNTRYID join dbo.ADDRESSTYPECODE atc on atc.ID = ADDRESSTYPECODEID where [ADDRESSBLOCK] like '%' + CHAR(9) + '%' or City like '%' + CHAR(9) + '%' or POSTCODE like '%' + CHAR(9) + '%' or dbo.[ADDRESS].[DESCRIPTION] like '%' + CHAR(9) + '%'
